item.title: Source Code's "Simulation" Rules Explained: Is Colter Creating New Realities?
item.description: Jake Gyllenhaal's character experiences a thoroughly compelling arc in Source Code, and the movie's biggest twist transforms his journey.

item.title: Beauty & The Beast's 2017 Gay LeFou Controversy Gets In-Depth Explanation From Josh Gad: "If I Were Gay, I'm Sure I'd Be Pissed"
item.description: Eight years after the live-action Beauty and the Beast's gay LeFou controversy, Josh Gad provides an in-depth explanation for the situation.
